DOC.brief_summary: To explore whether recombinant LH (rLH) supplementation (Leuveris) to recombinant follicle stimulating hormone (rFSH) following GnRH antagonist treatment has an advantage in infertile women with advanced reproductive ageing undergoing IVF-ET.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Luteinizing Hormone (LH) Supplementation Following Gonadotropin-releasing Hormone (GnRH) Antagonist Administration in Advanced Reproductive Ageing Women Undergoing IVF and Embryo Transfer (IVF/ET)
DOC.criteria: female candidate to IVF between 3045 years old not included for fertilization
